sentence: From our ride from the airport to our last meal in the dining room our stay was perfect
Nice but needs an upgrade in rooms
A staff member drives you to your room on a golf cart they make sure your luggage is put inside and then you are ready to start exploring the area
Workouts spa healthy eating just bring your own wine and soda if you wish and just keep in your room fridge
And trust me you will not want to leave until the last minute on the last day• Which room is best
I took advantage of the free snacks available at the main lodge and stashed a few in my room for when I was hungry between meals and wanted something more than a banana

knowledgeable speakers who spoke from the heart literally in the case of the physician who presented a cardiac health program spiritual advisors massage therapists hiking and walking guides dining room and kitchen staff housekeeping drivers fitness instructors and more
We were blessed to be placed in our casita by the exceptional Reservations Department more specifically Justin Riordan
The room was comfortable meals varied and delicious and the activities were as described and more
The ranch is a beautiful place it is built by the canyon and you get to see the panoramic view of the canyon
The only place we had difficulty getting into was dining room book dining before you arrive
Then on our last day they were so anxious to get out we were rushed out of the room before check out time
Even if you do not have a treatment scheduled just lounging in the locker room is an option
There is a refrigerator to store drinks or leftovers from meals
The dining options at the main dining room were very limited compared to a year ago
Also we heard that rooms will be renovated
They are in need of it for sure although I spent so little time in my room that I do not consider a somewhat outdated room a big negative
I have already received a response from management regarding thisFod was consistently great in the dining room but needs updating in the demo kitchen same recipes techniques from over a year ago
There are scheduled renovations have tried to reserve our preferred room for next year and have been unable to do that

I can understand how some new guests may arrive expecting 5 star luxury accommodations and be willing to pay up for it but I also suspect there are others like me who think the rooms as they are today are just fine
